General.Name: Daedong Steel Co. Ltd
General.Description: Daedong Steel Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells steel products. It offers hot-rolled coil, plate, and skelp products; hot-rolled steel plates; and cold-rolled coils/cold-rolled steel plates, electrical galvanized/galvanized steel plates, hot-dip galvanized steel/pickled and oiled steel products, as well as other products. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
General.Address: Namdong industrial complex, Incheon, South Korea
